name: Lil Gus' Quest
description:
Lil Gus' Quest is a small platformer developed in 2018 using GameMaker. It is very much a Super Meat Boy knockoff made for the purposes of learning how to write using GameMaker's programming language, GML. There are only a handful of levels, and Lil Gus' Quest can be completed in under thirty minutes.

The game is Windows-only, and supports both gamepad and keyboard input. A website with a post-game survey can be found here.

Art by Maddy Doak.
Code/Levels/Sounds by Josh Reiss.

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys/Left stick to move
  • Space/A to jump or select
  • Escape/B to cancel
  • Shift/X to sprint
  • Escape/Start to pause
